hero.title: Stay connected with your neighbors.
hero.tagline: Updates from your building, all in one place.
hero.description: Naaber helps people who live in the same house or building share <bold>announcements</bold>, <bold>events</bold>, and <bold>local news</bold> so everyone stays informed.
hero.cta: See what's happening in my building

highlights: Get announcements from your community president.
See upcoming events in your building.
Stay informed about what's happening around you.

announcements.title: Announcements
announcements.description: Important updates from your community president and building board.

events.title: Events
events.description: From casual meetups to official meetings, see what's planned in your building.

news.title: Neighborhood news
news.description: Short updates about what‚Äôs happening around your area.

step1.title: Join your building space
step1.description: Create an account and choose the building or house you live in.

step2.title: Get updates in one place
step2.description: See announcements, upcoming events, and local news without digging through group chats.

step3.title: Stay in sync with your neighbors
step3.description: Reply, react, and share your own updates so everyone stays on the same page.

about.title: About Us
about.description: This app was done for ourselves and we decided to share it with everyone.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question about our meal planning features, need help with your account, or just want to share your feedback, our team is here to help.

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.description: The best way to reach us is by email. We typically respond within 24-48 hours during business days.

account.title: Account & Technical Support
account.description: Having trouble logging in, managing your account, or experiencing technical issues? We're here to help troubleshoot and get you back on track.

mealPlanning.title: Meal Planning Questions
mealPlanning.description: Need guidance on how to make the most of your meal plans? Have questions about recipes, ingredients, or dietary preferences? Let us know!

feedback.title: Feedback & Suggestions
feedback.description: We're always looking to improve! Your feedback helps us make 9meals.ai better for everyone. Share your ideas, feature requests, or suggestions.

privacy.title: Privacy Concerns
privacy.description: Have questions about your data or want to exercise your privacy rights under GDPR? Contact us and we'll assist you promptly.

beforeContact.title: Before You Contact Us
beforeContact.description: When reaching out, please include as much detail as possible about your question or issue. This helps us provide you with the most accurate and helpful response.

contact.thankYou: Thank you for using 9meals.ai. We appreciate your support and look forward to helping you on your meal planning journey! üçΩÔ∏è

notFound.headline: This page got eaten!
notFound.message: Oops! The recipe you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved to a different kitchen.

footer.tagline: AI-powered meal planning for busy people
